words.context_notes: Crazy/insane, mild insult implying mental instability (romanized: meshuga)
Stupid/foolish, mild intellectual insult (romanized: tipesh)
Idiot, borrowed from English/Greek, mild insult (romanized: idiot)
Moron, from Russian, mild intellectual insult (romanized: debil)
Fool, biblical Hebrew term for stupid person (romanized: ksil)
Dumb/stupid, implies lack of intelligence (romanized: metumtam)
Shit (Arabic: خرا khara), common profanity from Arabic, moderate severity (romanized: khara)
Dick/penis (romanized: zayin), also means weapon in Hebrew, moderate sexual profanity
You dick (romanized: ya zayin), direct insult using sexual organ, can be used jokingly among friends
Whore/prostitute (romanized: zona), derogatory term for women
Maniac/asshole (romanized: manyak), implies crazy or antisocial behavior
Scoundrel/dishonest person (romanized: menuval), implies moral corruption
Low-class person (romanized: ars), discriminatory term ruled offensive by Israeli courts
Bimbo (romanized: freha), derogatory term for attractive but unintelligent woman
Go to hell (romanized: lech la'azazel), biblical curse meaning go to the devil
Go fuck yourself (romanized: tizdayen), strong sexual curse commanding masturbation
Go fuck yourself (romanized: lech lehizdayen), full phrase commanding sexual self-gratification
Son of a whore (romanized: ben zona), compound family insult attacking mother's reputation

Your mother's cunt (romanized: kus emek), compound sexual family insult from Arabic
To fuck (romanized: lezayen), sexual verb meaning to have intercourse aggressively
Masturbating (romanized: mizdayen), someone engaging in self-gratification
Piece (romanized: hatikha), objectifying term for attractive woman, literally means piece
Slut/whore (Arabic: شرموطة sharmuta), highly derogatory sexual slur against women from Arabic
Belly (romanized: gachon), derogatory term for fat person, focuses on stomach
Scoundrel/villain (romanized: naval), biblical term for morally corrupt person
Bastard (romanized: mamzer), biblical term for illegitimate child, general insult
Pig (romanized: khazir), insulting comparison to non-kosher animal, implies uncleanliness
Dog (Hebrew: כלב kelev, Arabic: كلب kalb), common animal insult implying loyalty betrayal or lowness
Donkey/ass (romanized: chamor), mild insult implying stupidity, biblical reference
Fool (romanized: shoteh), biblical/talmudic term for foolish person
Wicked person/villain (romanized: rasha), biblical term for evil character
Retarded (romanized: mefager), offensive term for mentally disabled, highly inappropriate
Non-Jew (romanized: goy), can be neutral or derogatory depending on context and tone
Faggot (romanized: kuksinel), military slang for incompetent soldier, also homophobic slur, highly offensive
Military slang (romanized: shokist) for soldier who adapts/compromises principles, mild criticism
Military slang (romanized: jobnik) for non-combat soldier, implies easier service
Senior soldier (romanized: pazamnik) nearing discharge, military hierarchy term
Military slang (romanized: mitchapsen) for soldier doing minimum work, implies laziness
Military slang (romanized: shavuz) for tired/complaining soldier
Military slang (romanized: methaphen) for someone who avoids duties/responsibilities
Garbage/trash (romanized: zevel), calling someone worthless or disgusting
Piece of garbage (romanized: hatikhat zevel), compound insult emphasizing complete worthlessness

Homo (romanized: homo), derogatory shortening of homosexual, offensive slur
Lesbian (romanized: lesbit), can be neutral term or slur depending on context
